title: Episode 256: Queso, Not From a Jar
description:
Sunday is the Super Bowl! Which means: homemade queso. Assistant editor Sohla El Waylly talks us through her recipe. Then it's senior writer Alex Beggs with Cook, Marry, Kill.

Get the recipe from this episode:
Queso, Not From a Jar
